articles.title: Apple revokes certificate for ‘Hermit’ spyware app that targeted iPhones in Italy, Kazakhstan : Report
articles.description: Apple has revoked certificates for ‘Hermit’ spyware which was used to target iPhones in Italy. The incidents were first highlighted by Lookout research and later reported by Google's Threat Analysis Group as well.
articles.content: TAGs analysis showed both Android and iOS devices were targeted using Hermit, which has been developed by an Italian vendor called RCS Lab. Now, Apple has said revoked all known accounts and certific… [+2449 chars]
